mapper.select: SELECT sp.ent_ceo_no AS entCeoNo, p.products_nm AS productName, pc.small_category AS cateName, p.products_status AS productStatus, q.quantity AS quantity FROM sell_products sp JOIN products p ON sp.products_no = p.products_no JOIN products_category pc ON p.product_category_no = pc.product_category_no JOIN quantity q ON sp.products_no = q.products_no AND sp.ent_ceo_no = q.ent_ceo_no GROUP BY sp.ent_ceo_no, p.products_no;
